about.livecodes.para1.translation: <tag-1><tag-0>LiveCodes</tag-0></tag-1> is an <tag-2>open-source</tag-2>, <tag-3>feature-rich</tag-3>, <tag-4>client-side</tag-4> code playground. Currently, <tag-6>80+ languages/<tag-5></tag-5>frameworks</tag-6> are supported. It can be used as a standalone app or can be <tag-7>embedded</tag-7> in any web page. There are many ways to <tag-8>prefill playgrounds</tag-8> with code.

about.livecodes.para2.translation: A wide range of <tag-0>configuration options</tag-0> makes it very flexible. A powerful <tag-1>SDK</tag-1> (for <tag-2>JS/TS</tag-2>, <tag-3>React</tag-3>, <tag-4>Vue</tag-4> and <tag-5>Svelte</tag-5>) facilitates <tag-6>embedding</tag-6> and <tag-7>communicating</tag-7> with playgrounds. <tag-8>Comprehensive documentations</tag-8> are available with code samples, live demos and screenshots.
